concept.title: Tags
concept.shortdesc: An introduction to the different tags and elements featured in LwDITA.

conbody.p:
According to the working draft of the Oasis article Lightweight DITA: An Introduction, here is a specific and strict set of elements that you can use within LwDITA. These are the only elements you can use.

In-Line Formatting: Bold, italics, underline, super script, subscript
Lists: Definition lists,list items, ordered lists, unordered lists

Topic
We will be looking into two of the most common elements: Section and List. We will also introduce how to use two useful tools from full DITA - Conref and Keyref.
